testcase.name: testKoreanNamesAccuracy
testcase.system-out:
Loaded 230 Korean names for testing
=== KOREAN ROMANIZER ACCURACY REPORT === Total names tested: 230

Korean: 이하윤 | Expected: Lee Ha-yoon | Our result: ihayun Last name: 이 → Expected: Lee | Ours: i First name: 하윤 → Expected: Ha-yoon | Ours: hayun
Korean: 박도윤 | Expected: Park Do-yun | Our result: bakdoyun Last name: 박 → Expected: Park | Ours: bak First name: 도윤 → Expected: Do-yun | Ours: doyun

Korean: 정은우 | Expected: Jeong Eun-woo | Our result: jeongeunu Last name: 정 → Expected: Jeong | Ours: jeong First name: 은우 → Expected: Eun-woo | Ours: eunu

Korean: 조시우 | Expected: Jo Si-woo | Our result: josiu Last name: 조 → Expected: Jo | Ours: jo First name: 시우 → Expected: Si-woo | Ours: siu
